name: tyler coolidge - NO SCOPE (feat. Nate Curry)

metadata.description:
‘Ello loves, my name is tyler coolidge (all lowercase please) and I am an artist, producer and writer from the Bay Area, California. I’ve been on the artist-grizzle for a little over ten years now, specializing in Hip-Hop and R&B music—often a fun blend of both at the same time. I believe anyone who knows me well would say that my personality matches pretty closely to the music I make, which is usually smooth/chill and easy-going, but with sprinkles of high energy all over the place. (I’m an espresso guy)

The track I’ve decided to finish and share with you all is called “NO SCOPE,” which is produced by my good friend Future James and also features the extremely-talented Sacramento native Nate Curry, making this track an all-Bay Area collaboration! The track is easygoing, playful and catchy while also capturing an element of fun in it, which I alluded to in the last paragraph—I think this track encapsulates who I am and what I’m like pretty well. My favorite thing to make music about is the early stages of a fresh romance, where you have to choose words carefully and put on your best outfits and stuff like that, lol. It’s just a fun, nervous, almost juvenile-feeling time and “NO SCOPE” is about “shooting your shot” in those situations! Shooting your shot… no scope… get it?????

I am extremely grateful to be up here on the Sound.xyz stage sharing my new art with this awesome and loving community that I’ve seen grow over the past year, and can’t wait to interact with y’all and build even more together. Thank you Sound so much for having me, and shoutout to my man Greydient for helping me get here. Plenty more to come, much love to allayall! <3

lyrics.text:
(Hook - tyler coolidge)
Hey baby you float my boat
Bet I’m shootin’ my shot, no scope
She look straight outta Trader Joes
(What’s your availability)
I don’t wanna miss the boat
(I don’t wanna hear I told ya)
Don’t even wanna take her near the bros
Cause she that, cause she that, cause she that fine

Soon as I walk in the room and I smell her perfume
I try to be cool as I can
(Just be cool, just be cool, just be cool)
But she got booty for days
So I’m in the mirror saying
You the man, you the man, you the man
Look at shawty go
Yea look shawty roll
Maybe I got it in for this bad lil thing, yea yea yea

(Verse 1 - tyler coolidge)
Comin’ to where you at
I wanna pay your rent
She sexy dangerous
You might wanna come with the aim assist
I don’t belong (to the streets)
I think I belong (in your sheets)
So like the J-U-I-C-Y across your cheeks
I’m on your ass
Give you the flirt
Give you the work
Then pull it back
Get you feeling hella feelings you never had
You might’ve heard that I’m pro-ho
But I don’t give a fuck about no ho
Shawty you give me FOMO

(Hook - tyler coolidge)
Hey baby you float my boat
Bet I’m shootin’ my shot, no scope
She look straight outta Trader Joes
(What’s your availability)
I don’t wanna miss the boat
(I don’t wanna hear I told ya)
Don’t even wanna take her near the bros
Cause she that, cause she that, cause she

(Verse 2 - Nate Curry)
Shawty rollin’ with me
No kizzy, no skizzy
She got body plenty
I’m gon’ have to get up in it
She know what she doin’
And she not playing wittem
If you fuck with a real one
I keep you front and center
She got me practicing lines
In the mirror
Pull up one time
Be my dinner
Give me a sign
Just a glimmer of hope
Come on why don’t, woah

(Hook - tyler coolidge)
Hey baby you float my boat
Bet I’m shootin’ my shot, no scope
She look straight outta Trader Joes
(What’s your availability)
I don’t wanna miss the boat
(I don’t wanna hear I told ya)
Don’t even wanna take her near the bros
Cause she that, cause she that, cause she that fine
